Package es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy

Interface WebhookCrawlerStrategy<R,T extends Event>

Type Parameters:
R - the raw payload type received from the webhook (e.g. String)
T - the target Event type produced after deserialization
All Superinterfaces:
CrawlerStrategy<T>
public interface WebhookCrawlerStrategy<R,T extends Event> extends CrawlerStrategy<T>
A CrawlerStrategy specialized for webhook-based ingestion, where external systems push raw payloads to your application.

WebhookCrawlerStrategy is typically used behind an HTTP controller or any push endpoint. Incoming requests provide a raw payload of type R, which is deserialized into a typed Event and buffered internally for later consumption through CrawlerStrategy.crawl().

This design mirrors common reliable-webhook patterns: accept the HTTP request quickly, enqueue the event, and process it asynchronously. [web:21]

Since:
1.0.0

    Methods inherited from interface es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy.CrawlerStrategy

    crawl

  • Method Details

    • receive

      void receive(R raw)
      Receives a single raw payload from the webhook entry point.

      Typical usage from an HTTP controller:

      
 @PostMapping("/webhook/parking")
 public ResponseEntity<Void> receive(@RequestBody String payload) {
     strategy.receive(payload);
     return ResponseEntity.accepted().build();
 }

      Implementations produced by WebhookCrawlerStrategy.WebhookBuilder will deserialize the payload, push the resulting event into an EventBuffer, and invoke the configured onEvent callback.

      Parameters:
      raw - the raw payload received from the webhook; must not be null

    • from

      static <R> WebhookCrawlerStrategy.WebhookSourceStep<R> from(Class<R> rawType)
      Entry point of the fluent builder for constructing a WebhookCrawlerStrategy.

      The rawType parameter is currently not used at runtime but documents the expected raw type at the call site:

      
 WebhookCrawlerStrategy<String, ParkingEvent> strategy =
         WebhookCrawlerStrategy.from(String.class)
                               .deserializeWith(myDeserializer)
                               .build();
      Type Parameters:
      R - the raw payload type
      Parameters:
      rawType - the raw class type (for readability only)
      Returns:
      a WebhookCrawlerStrategy.WebhookSourceStep to continue the builder chain
